explains: adv. 名义上地；有名无实地

sentences.en: The sultan was still nominally the chief of staff.
sentences.cn: 苏丹在名义上仍是军队领导人。

sentences.en: He was nominally in charge of the company.
sentences.cn: 他名义上管理着这家公司。

sentences.en: The road is nominally under the control of UN peacekeeping troops.
sentences.cn: 那条路名义上是在联合国维和部队的控制之下。
